Tomato Leaf Blight.Symptoms: Dark brown lesions on leaves, yellowing, wilting.
Tomato Leaf Blight.Causes: Fungal infection due to high humidity.
Tomato Leaf Blight.Cure: Use copper-based fungicides, remove infected leaves, improve air circulation.

Powdery Mildew.Symptoms: White powdery spots on leaves and stems.
Powdery Mildew.Causes: Fungal spores spreading in dry conditions.
Powdery Mildew.Cure: Apply sulfur-based fungicides, improve air circulation, avoid excessive nitrogen fertilizers.

Bacterial Wilt.Symptoms: Sudden wilting of leaves, yellowing, brown streaks in stems.
Bacterial Wilt.Causes: Bacterial infection spread through soil and water.
Bacterial Wilt.Cure: Use disease-resistant varieties, rotate crops, ensure proper soil drainage.

Early Blight.Symptoms: Small brown spots on older leaves, spreading in circular patterns.
Early Blight.Causes: Fungal spores activated by wet conditions.
Early Blight.Cure: Apply fungicides containing chlorothalonil or mancozeb, remove infected plant debris.

Late Blight.Symptoms: Dark, water-soaked lesions on leaves and stems, white fungal growth on the underside.
Late Blight.Causes: Fungal infection worsened by wet and humid conditions.
Late Blight.Cure: Use copper-based fungicides, remove infected plants, avoid overhead watering.

Rust Disease.Symptoms: Orange or yellow pustules on leaves, leading to defoliation.
Rust Disease.Causes: Fungal spores spread by wind and rain.
Rust Disease.Cure: Apply fungicides like myclobutanil, remove infected leaves, improve ventilation.

Downy Mildew.Symptoms: Yellow patches on leaves, purple-gray mold on undersides.
Downy Mildew.Causes: Fungal-like pathogen thriving in moist conditions.
Downy Mildew.Cure: Use copper fungicides, improve air circulation, avoid overhead watering.

Leaf Spot Disease.Symptoms: Circular, brown or black spots on leaves.
Leaf Spot Disease.Causes: Fungal or bacterial infections spread through water splashes.
Leaf Spot Disease.Cure: Apply neem oil or fungicides, remove affected leaves, ensure proper spacing of plants.

Rice Blast Disease.Symptoms: Grayish lesions on leaves, leading to plant collapse.
Rice Blast Disease.Causes: Fungal spores that thrive in high humidity and warm temperatures.
Rice Blast Disease.Cure: Use resistant rice varieties, avoid excessive nitrogen fertilizers, apply fungicides if needed.

Wheat Rust.Symptoms: Reddish-brown or black pustules on wheat leaves and stems.
Wheat Rust.Causes: Fungal spores spread by wind and rain.
Wheat Rust.Cure: Apply rust-resistant wheat varieties, use fungicides, rotate crops.
